description: New recessed in-wall air conditioning grilles to first & second floor bedrooms; extension to either end of bedhead wall in first floor master bedroom; removal of nib wall(s) to first floor master bedroom; first floor bathroom stone floor finish & pattern design; new external ventilation louvre panel to lightwell basement window; new external wall light fixtures and door access control plates to main building; replacement fireplace slips to ground floor living & dining rooms; reinstatement of fireplace hearth to ground floor boot room; new stone hearths to second floor where fireplaces reinstated; replacement stone urn, over north loggia entrance; update to landscape design; modifications to lower basement secondary stairs; addition of open plan kitchenette to ground floor staff room; modification to external stair balustrade down from rear terrace (part retrospective).
